relation: Darrow2 - #93 Although seemingly impervious to damage, the alien Giegue suddenly begins to lose his composure when faced with this bittersweet melody.
Darrow2 - #94 Regardless of the physical pain they feel the young children continue to sing, believing in the melody that was taught to them in their long journey.
Darrow2 - #95 Memories of Maria begin to surface as Giegue comes to realize his greatest weakness. The inescapable pain that comes with his memories is something that will haunt him for eternity.
Darrow2 - #96 As the vision of Maria appears before Giegue, he finally breaks down and accepts defeat. For him, this song is more painful than any attack the children could possibly use.

Darrow2 - #97 The power of the Earth, the children, and Maria unify together as the song comes to an end. Although Maria will forever be gone after the song comes to an end, her love will live on in Giegue's heart always.
